member.name: T:Tizen.Content.MimeType.MimeUtil
member.summary: The MimeUtil API provides functions to map the MIME types to file extensions and vice versa.
member.remarks: Conversions are provided from the file extensions to MIME types and from the MIME types to file extensions.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.MimeType.MimeUtil.GetMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MIME type for the given file extension. The MIME type is 'application/octet-stream' if the given file extension is not associated with specific file formats.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.MimeType.MimeUtil.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extensions for the given MIME type.
member.returns: If successful, returns the list of file extension strings for the given MIME type. The array of file extension is without the leading dot ('.').
